com.rath.rathbot.cmd

Class PermissionsTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rath.rathbot.cmd.PermissionsTable

  • public class PermissionsTable
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds each user's permission level. Certain commands require a specific level to execute.
    Author:
    Tim Backus tbackus127@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int DEFAULT_PERM_LEVEL
      The default permissions level new users are added with.
      private static java.lang.String PERM_DATA_FILENAME
      The filename for the permission data.
      private static java.lang.String PERM_DATA_PATH
      The path for the permission data.
      private static java.io.File PERM_FILE
      The permissions table file.
      private static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Integer> permMap
      The permissions table.
      private static boolean saveToDisk
      Whether or not to actually save the table to disk (disable for testing purposes).

      Clears the permissions table, but does not save it to disk.

      Loads the permission table from the hard disk.
      static boolean removeUser(long userID)
      Removes the entry for a given user (if they leave, are banned, or purged).

    • Method Detail

      • disableSaveToDisk

        public static final void disableSaveToDisk()
        Disables saving the table to disk.

      • initUser

        public static final boolean initUser(long userID)
        Initializes a user with default permissions.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the member to initialize.
        Returns:
        false if there was an error.

      • updateUser

        public static final boolean updateUser(long userID,
                                       int permLevel)
        Updates the permissions table for a given user.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the member to update.
        permLevel - the new permissions level this user should receive.
        Returns:
        false if there was an error.

      • removeUser

        public static final boolean removeUser(long userID)
        Removes the entry for a given user (if they leave, are banned, or purged).
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the member to remove.
        Returns:
        false if there was an error.

      • getLevel

        public static final int getLevel(long userID)
        Gets the permission level for the given user.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the member we're getting the permission level for.
        Returns:
        the permission level as an int, defined in RBCommand. If there is an error, -1 will be returned.

      • hasUser

        public static final boolean hasUser(long userID)
        Whether or not an entry exists for a user.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the user to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the user exists; false if not. If the table is null, false will be returned.

      • getPermMap

        public static final java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Integer> getPermMap()
        Gets the reference to the permissions table.
        Returns:
        the permissions table as a TreeMap.

      • clearTable

        public static final void clearTable()
        Clears the permissions table, but does not save it to disk. USE WITH CAUTION.

      • savePerms

        public static final void savePerms()
        Saves the permission table to the hard disk.

      • loadPerms

        public static final void loadPerms()
        Loads the permission table from the hard disk.
